data.meta_site_name: Carol Jackson Obituary | April 1, 2021 | Eternal Light Funeral Home - Elsa, TX
data.text:
Edinburg– Carol Jackson, 84, went to be with the Lord Thursday, April 1, 2021 at her residence in Edinburg, Texas. Mrs. Jackson was born on June 21, 1936 in Wester Ohio to Charles Edward Morrison and Lucille Cyio. She is preceded in death by her son; Charles Morrison and her parents.

Mrs. Carol Jackson is survived by her loving children; Kenneth Joseph Jackson, Edward Jackson, grandchildren; Charles Morrison II, Matthew Morrison and Tim Jackson.

Mrs. Jackson will be cremated at a later date. Funeral arrangements have been entrusted to the care of Eternal Light Funeral Home of Elsa, TX.

A mask or facial covering is required when entering the funeral home. Thank you for your cooperation and God bless you.
